general_advisory: As per the forecast received, dry weather may prevail over the district of Puri for the next five days with mainly clear to partly cloudy skies. The wind speed is expected to be around 6-9 km/h. The daily maximum and minimum temperatures will likely remain between 27-28°C and 13-14°C, respectively.

advisory: Farmers going for transplanting should apply DAP, MOP, and Urea per acre according to guidelines.
To minimize White grab infestation, drench with Chloropyriphos or Imidacloprid.
Apply recommended fertilizers and FYM at planting.
Do not apply Urea after 120 days post-planting.
To control hairy caterpillar, spray specified insecticides.
Manage Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer infestations.
Use recommended pesticides based on guidelines.
Apply carbendazim 3%G to control red palm weevil infestation.
To control sigatoka leaf spot, spray specified fungicides.
